meanings.def: an object with a round folding frame of long, straight pieces of metal covered with material, that you use to protect yourself from the rain or from hot sun
examples: under an umbrella Spectators huddled under umbrellas as the rain poured down.
an umbrella stand (= for putting umbrellas in when they are not being used)

meanings.def: a thing that contains or includes many different parts or elements
examples: under the umbrella of something Many previously separate groups are now operating under the umbrella of a single authority.
‘Contact sports’ is an umbrella term for a variety of different sports.
Two separate political parties emerged from the umbrella organization.
The two sectors combined under the umbrella of the Scottish Council.
an umbrella group including members of opposition parties
the broad umbrella of alternative medicine

meanings.def: a country or system that protects people
examples: the American nuclear umbrella over Europe
